name: Sameen Eajaz

positions.subtitle: Philips Electronics India Ltd.
positions.description: Responsible for delivering projects with a team sizes of upto 15 members. Managed a medical diagnostics project development using Microsoft .Net technology for around 2 years. Currently responsible for the development of a medical product  for the emerging markets.

positions.subtitle: Philips Electronics India Ltd.
positions.description: As a Project Leader, I am responsible for leading teams on projects, addressing both technical and managerial aspects of the project. Other key responsibilities include:•  Managing communication interface with partners located at different sites• Planning and tracking resources on the project.• Technically leading the project design and architecture • Participating in requirement analysis and management, design and implementation of embedded/PC based software projects specifically using C/C++.
positions.title: Project Leader
positions.description_html:
As a Project Leader, I am responsible for leading teams on projects, addressing both technical and managerial aspects of the project.

Other key responsibilities include:

• Managing communication interface with partners located at different sites
• Planning and tracking resources on the project.
• Technically leading the project design and architecture
• Participating in requirement analysis and management, design and implementation of embedded/PC based software projects specifically using C/C++.

recommendations: Bhaskaran S. “Sameen is a person with a refreshingly bright mind. He can understand complex problems with ease, has a broad range of interests and is able to keep a strong head on his shoulder. He has proven that he can deliver complex projects that are multisite with a team that has a mix of seniors and juniors. Tireless and ever smiling, Sameen would be an asset to any team or group. It is a pleasure knowing such a professional.”

Michel Schols “I worked with Sameen when he was Team-leader / Software Architect for the UI and Service development of our Robotics project. Sameen was very enthusiastic and engaged during the robotics projects. He is not afraid to make his hands dirty and had the project started up in a short time! Although we had a lot of difficulties, Sameen his decisions and understanding helped the project to maintain its momentum. Even when he had to extend his travel to our other suppliers for integration and testing to meet a certain milestones. Despite the fact that family was waiting at home! When visiting each other we could have a very good chat and laugh! Sameen has a energetic and enthusiastic in what he does. He is an effective and knowledgeable team-leader regarding the technology at hand!”
